subject: Wrestling
Olympic Games (2012)
Homosexuality
Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
Weddings and Engagements
lead_paragraph: While some Olympians have come out after their athletic careers ended, the wrestler Stephany Lee heads to London as one of the few active, openly gay athletes in the history of the Games.
snippet: While some Olympians have come out after their athletic careers ended, the wrestler Stephany Lee heads to London as one of the few active, openly gay athletes in the history of the Games.
